content: If you cant view the full message, please go to Discord settings > Text & Images > enable `Show website preview info from links pasted into chat`

embeds.title: Roles
embeds.description:
<@&377536017990811660> - <@!332057468676866049> <@!556477683521814528> <@!594269315000172547>
<@&605171965082468383> - Previous MSD staff
<@&459369912771674112> - Amazing creators of mobile games/mobile speedrunning tools
<@&428026488348999703> - Participate in <#422675955241320448>, run games against each other & win prizes
<@&812050199815651389> - User with the most overall competition wins

<@&428027247367159810> - Ask them for help on iOS
<@&460747632135110680> - Ask them for help streaming

[Official MSD twitch channel](https://www.twitch.tv/mobilespeedrun)
[Game-specific servers](https://gist.github.com/zromick/d925eef55bad8feffc444ddea067e9d8)

**Affiliated Discords**
[Mobile Highscores](https://discord.gg/hMr3kHAEka) achieve mobile game high score
[Code Runners](https://discord.gg/J2KaVzs) coding tools for speedrunners created by speedrunners
[Website Speedrunning](http://discord.gg/Rek9anM) speedrun websites
[Google Speedrunning](https://discord.gg/7MXyJHs) speedrun games by Google

embeds.title: Tips
embeds.description:
- Airplane mode / turn off wifi to avoid ads
- For Android, use [NetGuard](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.faircode.netguard&hl=en) to block ads on any app
- Make sure you have enough storage before attempting a long run
- [Glossary of speedrun terms](http://www.speedrunslive.com/faq/glossary)
- For retiming, you can increment frame by frame using , & . on Youtube!
- `Slush Puppy#4986`['s retime tool](https://github.com/Slush0Puppy/retime/releases)
**Android screen recorders:**
- [Game screen recorder](http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?-id=com.drivergenius.screenrecorder) by DGenius Mobile
- [Mobizen Screen Recorder - Record, Capture, Edit](http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rsupport.mvagent) By Mobizen

embeds.title: Rules
embeds.description:
Here at the Mobile Speedrunning Discord (MSD) we expect youâ€™ll have fun! But having fun comes with rules, and we also expect you to follow these rules to the best of your abilities. Failure to abide by these rules as deemed by the mods can result in a kick or ban.
:no_entry_sign: hate speech.
:no_entry_sign: inappropriate/immature jokes.
:no_entry_sign: shitposting.
:no_entry_sign: spamming.
:no_entry_sign: memes, unless speedrunning related.
:no_entry_sign: swearing occasionally is fine, but don't overdo it.
:no_entry_sign: Discord invites, unless speedrunning related.
:no_entry_sign: NSFW.
:no_entry_sign: phishing.
:warning: English is the main language of the MSD, please stick to speaking English in chat.
